name: Switch - Black & White
description: Minimalistic game in the style "Black & White". Game that will test your reaction.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, 7, Vista, 8, 8.1, 10 Processor: Intel Celeron G3930 Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 30 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP, 7, Vista, 8, 8.1, 10 Processor: Intel Celeron G3930 Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 30 MB available space
